column1: Schuhbeck's cooking school. Learning to cook with Alfons Schuhbeck
column4: All beginning is easy! At least if you have a teacher like Alfons Schuhbeck at your side while learning how to cook. With his help even the most unskilled beginner can get the best grades for his dishes. The trick that the award-winning master chef uses is to visualize. The individual work steps are reproduced on color photos in the format of approx. 3x4 cm. Among these are the brief information about the preparation. This is how Schuhbeck's cooking school presents everything
